sentences.en: ...cane furniture.
sentences.cn: …藤制家具。

sentences.en: a cane chair
sentences.cn: 藤椅

sentences.en: A few minutes later, the eyes cane back again.
sentences.cn: 待了一会儿, 那对眼睛又来了.

sentences.en: A white cane sofa is sumptuously upholstered in gold taffeta and purple velvet.
sentences.cn: 白藤沙发上配有金色塔夫绸和紫色天鹅绒制成的沙发垫，显得豪华而精致。

sentences.en: An old man was walking with a cane.
sentences.cn: 一位老人在拄着拐走路.

sentences.en: cane furniture
sentences.cn: 藤制家具

sentences.en: Children knew that if they misbehaved they would get the cane .
sentences.cn: 孩子们知道，如果调皮捣蛋的话就会挨藤条。

sentences.en: English schoolmasters used to cane the boys as a punishment.
sentences.cn: 英国小学老师过去常用教鞭打男学生作为惩罚.

sentences.en: He clutched the cane in his clammy hand.
sentences.cn: 他那湿冷的手紧抓住手杖.

sentences.en: He sports an ivory - handled cane these days.
sentences.cn: 这些天来,他一直在炫耀一只象牙柄手杖.

sentences.en: He stopped, shifting his cane to his left hand.
sentences.cn: 他停了下来，将手杖移到左手。

sentences.en: He wore a grey suit and leaned heavily on his cane.
sentences.cn: 他身穿一件灰色西装,吃力地拄着拐杖。

sentences.en: In school, you knew if you misbehaved you would get the cane.
sentences.cn: 在学校不守规矩是要挨藤条的。

sentences.en: Lying back in his reclining cane chair, Chueh - hui resumed his reading.
sentences.cn: 觉 慧 把手缩回来, 又躺下去看书.

sentences.en: Many farmers are refusing to harvest the cane.
sentences.cn: 很多农民正拒绝收割甘蔗。

sentences.en: She eventually used a cane, then a walker, and finally was confined to the house.
sentences.cn: 结果她拄上了拐杖，后来又用上了助行架，最后连房门都出不了了。

sentences.en: The quiz showed up Cane's weak points in physics.
sentences.cn: 这次测验看出了凯恩在物理学方面的弱点.

sentences.en: This sugar cane is quite a sweet and juicy.
sentences.cn: 这甘蔗既甜又多汁.

sentences.en: Until the 1980s some criminals were still flogged with a rattan cane as a punishment.
sentences.cn: 直到20世纪80年代，有些罪犯仍被处以笞刑。

sentences.en: We heard the swish of a cane.
sentences.cn: 我们听到藤条的抽打声.

words.tran_cn: 用笞杖（或荆条等）打（cane的ing形式）

trans.tran_en: thin pieces of the stems of plants, used for making furniture and baskets
